mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM MEAL WHERE SUBCAT_ID = ${subcat_id}
SELECT DISTINCT FOOD FROM MEAL JOIN INGREDIENT USING(MEAL_ID, SUBCAT_ID) WHERE SUBCAT_ID = ${subcat_id}
SELECT SUBCAT_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE SUBCAT_ID = ${subcat_id}
SELECT FOOD, DESCRIPTION, CARBO, PROTEIN, FAT, CALORIES FROM (MEAL JOIN INGREDIENT i USING(MEAL_ID, SUBCAT_ID)) JOIN NUTRIENT n USING(FOOD) WHERE MEAL_ID = ${meal_id}
SELECT DISTINCT SUBCAT_ID FROM MEAL ORDER BY SUBCAT_ID
SELECT MEAL_PREFER.* FROM (SELECT MEAL_ID, MEAL_NAME, SRC FROM MEAL JOIN PREFERENCES p USING(SUBCAT_ID) WHERE USER_NO = ${user_no} ORDER BY dbms_random.value) MEAL_PREFER WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT MEAL_CNT_TB.* FROM ( SELECT MEAL_ID, MEAL_NAME,SRC FROM MEAL LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MEAL_ID, COUNT(MEAL_ID) AS MEAL_CNT FROM MEAL_COMMENT WHERE REGDATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY MEAL_ID ) USING(MEAL_ID) ORDER BY MEAL_CNT DESC NULLS LAST ) MEAL_CNT_TB WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
